body: i was playing cth and when i chose scout, instead of giving me speed it gave me slowness 2
body_tagged: i was playing cth and when i chose scout, instead of giving me speed it gave me slowness 2
title: CTH Scout

replies.body: It's a minor glitch, bring this problem to one of the managers or Sr. mods, and they can discuss it with the Directors or funkystudios.
replies.body_tagged: It's a minor glitch, bring this problem to one of the managers or Sr. mods, and they can discuss it with the Directors or funkystudios.
